languages.text: "Чудно. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} благословил вас терпением, не подвластным обычным смертным. Позвольте удостовериться в подлинности ваших документов — в последний раз".

traits.locale_text: "Чудно. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} благословил вас терпением, не подвластным обычным смертным. Позвольте удостовериться в подлинности ваших документов — в последний раз".
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Wonderful. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} blessed you with patience greater than that apportioned to ordinary mortals. Allow me to verify the authenticity of your documents — for the final time."
languages.original_text: "Чудно. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} благословил вас терпением, не подвластным обычным смертным. Позвольте удостовериться в подлинности ваших документов — в последний раз".

traits.locale_text: "Wonderful. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} blessed you with patience greater than that apportioned to ordinary mortals. Allow me to verify the authenticity of your documents — for the final time."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "Wonderful. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} blessed you with patience greater than that apportioned to ordinary mortals. Allow me to verify the authenticity of your documents — for the final time."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "Wonderful. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} blessed you with patience greater than that apportioned to ordinary mortals. Allow me to verify the authenticity of your documents — for the final time."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "Wonderful. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} blessed you with patience greater than that apportioned to ordinary mortals. Allow me to verify the authenticity of your documents — for the final time."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: “太棒了，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}赐予了你远超常人的耐心。请允许我验证这些文件的真实性，这会是最后一次。”
languages.original_text: "Wonderful. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} blessed you with patience greater than that apportioned to ordinary mortals. Allow me to verify the authenticity of your documents — for the final time."

traits.locale_text: “太棒了，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}赐予了你远超常人的耐心。请允许我验证这些文件的真实性，这会是最后一次。”
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: «Magnífico. El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} le ha dotado de una paciencia mayor que la del común de los mortales. Permítame que verifique la autenticidad de los documentos por última vez».
languages.original_text: "Wonderful. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} blessed you with patience greater than that apportioned to ordinary mortals. Allow me to verify the authenticity of your documents — for the final time."

traits.locale_text: «Magnífico. El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} le ha dotado de una paciencia mayor que la del común de los mortales. Permítame que verifique la autenticidad de los documentos por última vez».
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: 「素晴らしい。凡人を上回る陛下の忍耐は{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}のご加護の賜物ですね。書類の真正性をあらためましょう。これが最後になりますので」
languages.original_text: "Wonderful. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} blessed you with patience greater than that apportioned to ordinary mortals. Allow me to verify the authenticity of your documents — for the final time."

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしい。凡人を上回る陛下の忍耐は{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}のご加護の賜物ですね。書類の真正性をあらためましょう。これが最後になりますので」
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: « Parfait. De toute évidence, l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} vous a fait don d'une patience bien supérieure au commun des mortels. Encore un petit instant, le temps que je vérifie une dernière fois l'authenticité de vos documents. »
languages.original_text: "Wonderful. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} blessed you with patience greater than that apportioned to ordinary mortals. Allow me to verify the authenticity of your documents — for the final time."

traits.locale_text: « Parfait. De toute évidence, l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} vous a fait don d'une patience bien supérieure au commun des mortels. Encore un petit instant, le temps que je vérifie une dernière fois l'authenticité de vos documents. »
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Wunderbar! Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} hat Euch mit mehr Geduld gesegnet als normale Sterbliche. Wenn Ihr erlaubt, überprüfe ich die Authentizität Eurer Dokumente – zum letzten Mal."
languages.original_text: "Wonderful. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} blessed you with patience greater than that apportioned to ordinary mortals. Allow me to verify the authenticity of your documents — for the final time."

traits.locale_text: "Wunderbar! Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} hat Euch mit mehr Geduld gesegnet als normale Sterbliche. Wenn Ihr erlaubt, überprüfe ich die Authentizität Eurer Dokumente – zum letzten Mal."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Muhteşem. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} size, sıradan fânilerden daha çok sabır bahşetmiş. Müsaadenizle son bir kez belgelerin hakiki olduğunu doğrulayayım."
languages.original_text: "Wonderful. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} blessed you with patience greater than that apportioned to ordinary mortals. Allow me to verify the authenticity of your documents — for the final time."
